meanings.definition: A tropical plant of the family Bromeliaceae, typically having colorful leaves and producing flowers.
meanings.sent1: The bromeliad in the garden has vibrant red leaves.
meanings.sent2: I bought a beautiful bromeliad for my living room.
meanings.sent3: The bromeliad at the party wore a tiny hat made of leaves.
meanings.sent4: Her personality bloomed like a bromeliad in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The bromeliad stood out among the greenery with its striking colors.
